issue.title: www.biomol.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.biomol.com/de/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.biomol.com%2Fde%2F) ### Comment > invisible cookie problem ``` Username: @sonnyxq ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/9ecds9jfz58o0gwskosgw8s4k4ooskwqtd5nyxqtbk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/hre8t649wrkgskw0sgskcogco8k0kgckjpp3waou5w.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.3 (5240) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block third-party Authorization header

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API

**Windows tracking**:
Turn off Advertising ID

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking

[https://www.biomol.com/de/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.biomol.com%2Fde%2F) ### Issue configuration issue.title: unblocked microsoft trackers
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

*

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

*

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

_No response_

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

measure.office.net
telem-edge.smartscreen.microsoft.com

comment.body:
> Cannot reproduce ads or Ad-Shield URLs. Is it still showing ads and those URLs?

Make sure your timezone is not in a GDPR country. More information can be found here: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/pull/222421#discussion_r2682805559.
